home.intro: A passionate full-stack developer specializing in building exceptional digital experiences. Currently, I'm focused on building modern, fast, and beautiful websites.

about.title: About Me
about.bio1: I'm a full-stack developer with a passion for building beautiful, functional, and user-friendly websites and applications. I have experience working with a variety of technologies and frameworks.
about.bio2: When I'm not coding, you can find me at the gym, reading about new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or spending time outdoors.

projects.title: Projects

projectOne.title: 1RM Calculator with RPE
projectOne.description: A calculator for maximum load for one repetition (1RM), with an additional RPE metric. Built using NextJS, TypeScript, ShadCN & Zed.

projects.description: A brief description of the project and the technologies used.

job1.title: Fullstack Web Developer
job1.description: Working on a large web application using React, TypeScript, NextJS, ShadCN, Supabase. Implementing complex UI components and optimizing performance.

job2.title: Front-End Developer
job2.description: Developed websites and applications for clients. Worked with Tailwind, Bootstrap, and other frameworks.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or would like to work together.
